00021 /* Linked List node. */
00022 typedef struct vocList_node_t {
00023     struct vocList_node_t *prev;  /* previous node */
00024     struct vocList_node_t *next;  /* next node */
00025     void *value;          /* value for this node */
00026     long *index;          /* index value for this node. */
00027 } vocList_node_t;
00028 
00029 /* Main descriptor for the List structure. */
00030 typedef struct vocList_t {
00031     long size;            /* index array size */
00032     long count;           /* number of items in this list */
00033     long pos;             /* current position in list */
00034     vocList_node_t **index;   /* array index of list nodes */
00035     struct vocList_node_t *first; /* first node */
00036     struct vocList_node_t *last;  /* last node */
00037 } vocList_t;
00038 
00039 /* Iterator type for iterating through the list. */
00040 typedef struct vocList_iter_t {
00041     struct vocList_node_t *current; /* current node */
00042 } vocList_iter_t;
